Package src.controller

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
src.controller.ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager extends Object
RservationManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and ReservationView and the model classes - Reservation, Guest and Room.

It can create and update reservation with the help of GuestManager and RoomManager.

Since:
2022-04-04

    • create

      public static void create(String checkedInDate, String checkedOutDate, String guestId, String roomId, int numberOfPax, ReservationStatus reservationStatus, RoomStatus roomStatus)
      A method that creates reservation.

      See ReservationStatus for different types of Reservation Status.

      See RoomStatus for different types of Room Status.

      Parameters:
      checkedInDate - the date which the guest checked in
      checkedOutDate - the date which the guest checked out
      guestId - Id of the guest
      roomId - Id of the room
      numberOfPax - number of people staying in one room
      reservationStatus - status of the reservation
      roomStatus - room status of the reserved room

    • remove

      public static boolean remove(String reservationId)
      A method that removes reservation from database.

      See RoomManager for more room management details.

      See Database for more details about database.

      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservation
      Returns:
      true is removes successfully. Otherwise, false if reservation id does not exist.

    • validateReservationId

      public static boolean validateReservationId(String reservationId)
      A method that validates reservation by reservation Id.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservation
      Returns:
      true if reservation is found in database. Otherwise, false if reservation id does not exist.

    • updateCheckedInDate

      public static boolean updateCheckedInDate(String reservationId, String date)
      A method that updates checked in date of reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservtion
      date - the date which the guest checked in
      Returns:
      true if updating of check in date is successful. Otherwise, false if the check in date is later than the check out date / reservation not found

    • updateCheckedOutDate

      public static boolean updateCheckedOutDate(String reservationId, String date)
      A method that updates checked out date of reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservation
      date - the date which the guest checked out
      Returns:
      true if updating of check out date is successful. Otherwise, false if the check out date is earlier than the check in date.

    • updateGuestId

      public static boolean updateGuestId(String reservationId, String guestId)
      A method that updates guest id of reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservation
      guestId - Id of the guest
      Returns:
      true if updating of guest id is successful. Otherwise, false if the reservation id is not found.

    • updateRoomId

      A method that updates the status of reservation.

      See ReservationStatus for different types of Reservation Status.

      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservation
      roomId - Id of the room
      reservationStatus - status of reservation

      Returns:
      true if updating of room id is successful. Otherwise, false if the reservation id is not found.

      Parameters:

      val - true if the reservation is expired. Otherwise, false
      Returns:

      public static boolean checkInReservation(String reservationId)
      A method that checks in reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - - Id of the reservation
      Returns:
      true checks in successfully. Otherwise, false if reservation id does not exist/the guest had already checked in.

    • checkOutReservation

      A method that checks out reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservation
      Returns:
      true is checks out successfully. Otherwise, false if reservation id does not exist/the guest had already checked out.
